column2: Fix Pydevd breakpoint issues on windows

column3: Fixed a number of issues with debugger path handling on windows.

--Breakpoints weren't being hit inside bdist .egg files on windows
--Breakpoints weren't being in modules inside zip/egg files where the module name has an upper case letter
--Breakpoints not hit when the module is loaded from a short path names on windows (which is actually somewhat common)
@fitermay Thank you for the pull request! Please, fix the problems and we will merge it into the PyCharm.
Thanks for the comments. Could you please clarify the inner function comment? I will make the suggested changes ASAP. I also added tests that I will add to the pull request.
Updated with tests and fixed type plus the unicode thing.
--Fix translation of 'bdist' paths inside of eggs on windows
--Fix issue with breakpoints not being hit on windows inside .zip and¡­
--Handle normalization of short pathnames on windows
